title: PP-158,Lahore: PTI’s Mian Usman secures victory
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP):Mian Muhammad Akram Usman, a candidate of Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) won PP-158 Lahore,XV by securing 37,463 votes.
His rival Rana Ahsan of PML-N declared runner up by securing 31,906 votes.TLP’s Muhammad Bilal got 5,632 votes.
JIP’s Umair Awan managed only 569 votes.
Jamilur Rehman of PNP secured only 114 votes.
